communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Danly State AGs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records, including meeting notes, calendar entries, or email communications, related or referring to meetings between Commissioner James Danly and any state Attorney General or state Attorney General office. This request seeks records produced since January 2020. 

I am a reporter for The Nation and other outlets.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jimmy Tobias

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request - VIC Training Materials
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of all training materials, presentations,  assessments, user manuals, and other training documents given to Atlanta Police Department staff who work at Atlanta's Video Integration Center.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

e

communications.subject: [Request received]
communications.communication:
##- Please type your reply above this line -##

Hi,

We've received your support request and assigned it ID (117209). Our team is currently reviewing it and getting it to the right person, and no further action is required. If you'd like to provide more information related to this query, just reply to this email.

You might also find the following helpful:

* Our FOIA 101 guides: https://www.muckrock.com/project/foia-101-tips-and-tricks-to-make-you-a-transparency-master-234/
* Frequently asked questions: https://www.muckrock.com/faq/
* A FOIA training we recorded for Sunshine Week 2020 walking through the basics of public records: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LMZeLanD4mw&t=4s

Thanks for reaching out and we look forward to talking soon!

The MuckRock Team
--------------------------------
This email is a service from MuckRock.

communications.subject: RE: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request - VIC Training Materials
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please find enclosed a check for $40.49 to satisfy the fee associated with the attached public records request.

Thank you.

communications.subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request - VIC Training Materials
communications.communication:
Good afternoon, e,

We have received your payment.

Please resubmit any requests that were denied due to the outstanding invoice and we will begin processing them.

Please keep in mind that the information released is preliminary in nature and could change as the investigation progresses or new information comes to light.

Check the Atlanta Police Department’s News List<https://www.atlantapd.org/about-apd/advanced-components/news-list> for the latest on significant incidents.

[cid:image001.png@01D9EC9E.7574D840]
Ofc. J. Predmore
Public Information Officer

Mobile: (404) 556-4399
Email: jtpredmore@atlantaga.gov<mailto:jtpredmore@atlantaga.gov>
Address: 226 Peachtree St. SW
Website: www.atlantapd.org<http://www.atlantapd.org/>
